item.description:
Do you fall into one of these categories?


1) You lost a business or job in real estate

2) You are struggling in your real estate business or job 

3) You are doing just fine in real estate but don't know how to take it to the next level?

 

Regardless of which category you are in, you may have already tried learning new skills, going to career related seminars, buying books, getting new designations, etc, etc... All of which fall under "Informative Learning".  To succeed in this economy it will require much more than that, as many of you may have already learned.

 

You are invited to an extraordinary conversation about The Landmark Forum and Landmark Education.... a "Transformational Learning" experience.

 

Imagine your business and career life beyond your wildest dreams...  Experiencing each day as new and unique day, free from the constraints and limitations of the past… full of possibility, self expression, and aliveness; with the freedom to make a difference for yourself and others.

 

Over 90% of the people who complete The Landmark Forum report the following benefits: 

  • Greater effectiveness in relating to others
  • Increased personal productivity
  • Freedom in making the right choices/Pursuing what is important to you
  • Greater confidence
  • Living life more fully

What would these benefits do for your business and career life?

 

The Landmark Forum is a three-day-and-one-evening course designed to unlock the limitless possibilities in your life.

 

We invite you to find out what The Landmark Forum is, what it makes available, and what it could provide for you and your life.

 

Just bring yourself and a project, business, job, or any issue you would like to take to the next level.   Please bring your calendar and be prepared to register if you see The Landmark Forum would make a difference for you. 

 

The evening agenda:

6-7pm - Business Networking

7-10pm - Special Introduction to the Landmark Forum led by Andrea Binder (retired from the financial services industry at the age of 41.  Now she works full time leading and creating possibilities for others)

 

Free valet parking, coffee and water will be provided.  Seating is limited to the first 100 guests, register today at http://careerpossibility.eventbrite.com/

 

For any questions related to this event, please contact Ruben at 617-615-9245.
item.name: "Career Possibility" Networking Event
